name: Platformer's Toolkit
description:
In this little platforming adventure you're the one who gets to make the rules. With the laws of the universe at your hands, you get to help Fred reach the end of a strange cave. 

Use the mouse to edit the sliders which change the properties of the world around you. However, Fred has a will of his own, so you will have to guide him through.  

Made in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK game jam.
